## Introductory Lecture: Reproducibility and Literate Programming

| Date    | Time      | Location |
|---------|-----------|----------|
| 9/1/17  | 1 PM      | GRJ245   |

### Objectives

*	Gain an appreciation for how important reproducibility is in clinical data analyses, both for big and small data problems
*	Become familiar with the concept of literate programming
*	Become familiar with the elements of an R Markdown document
